long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract links and view them in a side panel.

Usage: right-click to open the context menu and click on “View LInks”.

Main features:

- Links are grouped by categories (telephone number, email address, internal and external navigation) and sorted alphabetically.
- URLs are decoded and formatted for better readability.
- Search filter is case insensitive.
- Copy or download URLs (and associated titles) as a plain text, JSON or CSV.
